resources.string: Reial Club Deportiu Espanyol de Barcelona, commonly known as RCD Espanyol or simply Espanyol, is a Spanish professional football club based in Barcelona, Catalonia. Founded in 1900 by Ángel Rodríguez, it is one of the oldest football clubs in Spain. Espanyol will compete in La Liga, the top tier of Spanish football, after earning promotion from the Segunda División in the 2024–25 season. The team plays its home matches at the RCDE Stadium, located in Cornellà de Llobregat, a suburb of Barcelona.
